nodes.text: The DL-T Heavy blaster pistol was a pistol undergoing tests and should not be available in general public. It is named "DL-T" due to its status as a testing weapon. Its appearance is a DL-44 heavy blaster pistol but has gold color on it. During the Galactic Civil War, these pistols were found used by smugglers.
This pistol's schematic is obtained by completing a mission in Star Wars Galaxies.
